pages.text: The Dwarf race is a skilled miner, and even has some proficiency in combat. Use this race if you go mining frequently. They are a bit shorter than the average player, however it isn't enough to make a noticable difference.

$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)75% Size$(br)$(4)-25%$() Attack Speed$(br)$(2)+25%$() Attack Damage$(br)$(4)-30%$() Health$(br)$(2)+25%$() Armor Toughness$(br)$(4)-25%$() Movement Speed$(br)$(2)+20%$() Knockback Resistance

$(l)Ability: Skilled Miner$()$(br)Dwarves mine all blocks at a fixed speed, gain more experience points for mining ores, apply 3 bonus psuedo-fortune levels to loot drops, and can mine blocks that require one pickaxe tier higher than their currently held pickaxe.
